=======================================================
:mod:`numina.core.qc` --- Quality Control for Numina 
=======================================================

.. automodule:: numina.core.qc
   :synopsis:  Quality Control for Numina


This module defines functions and classes which implement
quality assesment for Numina-based applications.

.. deprecated:: 0.17
   Use :mod:`numina.types.qc`

QA Levels
---------

The numeric values of the QC levels are given in this table.

+--------------+---------------+
| Level        | Numeric value |
+==============+===============+
| ``GOOD``     | 100           |
+--------------+---------------+
| ``FAIR``     | 90            |
+--------------+---------------+
| ``BAD``      | 70            |
+--------------+---------------+
